skills.name: Go Basics
skills.pattern: Packages, imports, functions, structs, pointers, slices, maps

skills.name: Error Handling
skills.pattern: if err != nil { return err }; errors.Is, errors.As, fmt.Errorf

skills.name: Interfaces
skills.pattern: type Reader interface { Read(p []byte) (n int, err error) }

skills.name: Embedding
skills.pattern: type Manager struct { Employee; department string }

skills.name: Defer
skills.pattern: defer file.Close() // runs when function returns

skills.name: Goroutines
skills.pattern: go func() { doWork() }(); runtime.GOMAXPROCS(n)

skills.name: Channels
skills.pattern: ch := make(chan int, 10); ch <- value; value := <-ch

skills.name: Select
skills.pattern: select { case v := <-ch1: ... case ch2 <- v: ... default: }

skills.name: WaitGroup
skills.pattern: var wg sync.WaitGroup; wg.Add(1); go func() { defer wg.Done() }(); wg.Wait()

skills.name: Mutex
skills.pattern: var mu sync.Mutex; mu.Lock(); defer mu.Unlock()

skills.name: Context
skills.pattern: ctx, cancel := context.WithTimeout(ctx, 5*time.Second); defer cancel()

skills.name: Worker Pools
skills.pattern: Jobs channel -> N workers -> Results channel

skills.name: Functional Options
skills.pattern: func WithTimeout(d time.Duration) Option { return func(c *Config) { c.timeout = d } }

skills.name: Builder Pattern
skills.pattern: NewBuilder().WithName('foo').WithSize(100).Build()

skills.name: Error Wrapping
skills.pattern: fmt.Errorf('parsing config: %w', err)

skills.name: net/http
skills.pattern: http.HandleFunc('/api', handler); http.ListenAndServe(':8080', nil)

skills.name: Gin Framework
skills.pattern: r := gin.Default(); r.GET('/users', getUsers); r.Run()

skills.name: Middleware
skills.pattern: func Logger() gin.HandlerFunc { return func(c *gin.Context) {...} }

skills.name: Go Testing
skills.pattern: func TestXxx(t *testing.T) { if got != want { t.Errorf(...) } }

skills.name: Table-Driven Tests
skills.pattern: tests := []struct{name, input, want string}{...}; for _, tt := range tests {...}

skills.name: Benchmarks
skills.pattern: func BenchmarkXxx(b *testing.B) { for i := 0; i < b.N; i++ {...} }

skills.name: Go Modules
skills.pattern: go mod init, go.mod, go.sum, go get, go mod tidy

skills.name: Go Generate
skills.pattern: //go:generate stringer -type=Status

skills.name: Go Vet/Lint
skills.pattern: go vet, golangci-lint, staticcheck

skills.name: Profiling
skills.pattern: import _ 'net/http/pprof'; go tool pprof http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/heap

skills.name: Memory Management
skills.pattern: GOGC, sync.Pool for reuse, escape analysis

skills.name: database/sql
skills.pattern: db.Query, db.Exec, rows.Scan, prepared statements

skills.name: GORM
skills.pattern: db.Create(&user); db.Where('name = ?', name).First(&user)

skills.name: gRPC
skills.pattern: protobuf, grpc.NewServer(), RegisterXxxServer

skills.name: Go Build
skills.pattern: go build -ldflags '-s -w', CGO_ENABLED=0, cross-compilation
